alert.note: Alert for Indian River; Martin; Northern Brevard County; Okeechobee; Osceola; Southern Brevard County; St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 10:25AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of St. Lucie, Okeechobee, Indian River, western Martin, Brevard and southeastern Osceola Counties through 1130 AM EST... At 1025 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kennedy Space Center to near Lakeport. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Fort Pierce, Rockledge and Sebastian. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. These types of funnel clouds are harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Indian River; Martin; Northern Brevard County; Okeechobee; Osceola; Southern Brevard County; St. Lucie
